line_height=”165″]Counsellors work with specific issues which arise from current life events. There are different specialities such as bereavement counselling, marriage or relationship counselling.[/gt3_custom_text][vc_empty_space height=”3vh”][gt3_custom_text text_color=”#727e85″ font_size=”18″ line_height=”165″ use_theme_fonts=”” google_fonts_text=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal”]
  • Gestalt Counselling
  • Couples and Relationship Counselling
  • Bereavement Counselling
  • Addiction Counselling
  • Skype Counselling
[/gt3_custom_text][gt3_spacing height=”0px” responsive_es=”true” height_mobile=”40″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” parallax=”content-moving” parallax_image=”53″][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”5.1vh”][vc_custom_heading text=”TESTIMONIALS” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:14|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_custom_heading text=”What Our Clients Say ” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:36|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal”][vc_empty_space height=”2vh”][vc_separator color=”custom” el_width=”75px” accent_color=”#d9e0e4″][vc_empty_space height=”0.5vh”][gt3_testimonials carousel_arrows=”dots” text_color=”#ffffff” sign_color=”#ffffff”][gt3_testimonial_item tstm_author=”John Nickelson” author_status=”Founder IT Hub” image=”100″ select_rate=”none”]“I found the staff professional and kind, explaining the process to me every step of the way. I understand myself more clearly now and have begun to make positive changes in my life. There was such a high level of customer service.”[/gt3_testimonial_item][gt3_testimonial_item tstm_author=”Samuel Williams” author_status=”Founder IT Hub” image=”607″ select_rate=”none”]“I found the staff professional and kind, explaining the process to me every step of the way. I understand myself more clearly now and have begun to make positive changes in my life. There was such a high level of customer service.”[/gt3_testimonial_item][gt3_testimonial_item tstm_author=”Karren Johnson” author_status=”Founder IT Hub” image=”608″ select_rate=”none”]“I found the staff professional and kind, explaining the process to me every step of the way. I understand myself more clearly now and have begun to make positive changes in my life. There was such a high level of customer service.”[/gt3_testimonial_item][/gt3_testimonials][vc_empty_space height=”7.5vh”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1514370970965{background-color: #f6f8f9 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_empty_space height=”6.1vh”][vc_custom_heading text=”WE HAVE BEST TEAM” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:14|text_align:left|color:%235c656d|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_empty_space height=”1vh”][vc_custom_heading text=”Meet Our Counsellors” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:36|text_align:left|color:%2342474c|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal”][vc_empty_space height=”3vh”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space height=”5.2vh”][gt3_custom_text text_color=”#727e85″ font_size=”18″ line_height=”165″ use_theme_fonts=”” google_fonts_text=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal”]We think it’s really important that clinicians have a mixture of clinical skill and human qualities that mean you can place your trust in them. We interview every potential partner in person before we agree to work with them, as well as carrying out rigorous background checks.[/gt3_custom_text][vc_empty_space height=”3vh”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”1.4vh”]

Dr. Anna Walker

Dr. Tom Stewart

Leading Neurologist
